start.state: Pro Hero Uravity here! What seems to be the trouble?
Wait a second-- Is there really an emergency here?
Oh, damn it, hold on, don't deal-- Shoot. Ugh, I'll follow the rules, but I swear Mina's pranks go too far sometimes.
Well... I guess I could end up protecting some people... from embarrassment, at least... okay! Plus Ultra! Let's do this!

case.state: Sorry, ~name~, I'm still trying to figure out how to play or I'd give you some advice!
Stay confident, ~name~! I have a feeling if you just remain calm we can get us all through this!
Ah! ~name~! Sorry! At least someone might enjoy you undressing...?
Most of the stuff I know about America I know from comic books. And All Might’s special moves.
Gunhead trained me in mixed martial arts! I’m actually really threatening in close combat. Hi-ya! Wh-whoa!
You know, I always did want to be a sorcerer growing up… Is that weird?
Hm… You’re part of that color-school. Beacon Academy, right, ~name~? I hear the heroes trained there are pretty flashy! And I’ve also heard you have a really great support program!
Oh, are you… A witch? Like, an actual one? I know some Quirks are mystical, but actual magic seems neat!
Oh no! Even when I'm trying to lose... argh! Sorry, ~name~!
Surrender your gun, Aimee!
Here she goes again…
Hey, wait a second, I think I recognize you. You’re Hawkeye Matchlock!
I always like to see a Quirk used to its utmost…
Aimee, I probably should’ve thought about this sooner…
Hey, wait a second, Alpha, do I know you from somewhere...?
W-wait a second. Alpha are you... really here? Or are you just... a hologram? I sure hope this isn't like my First Year campout...
Hm. You’re a student, Annie? What kind of course do you study? I’m guessing general studies or business...
Whoa, do you have a teleportation Quirk of some sort?
Hey, wait a second!
Your manner of speaking isn't really helping your case, Chiaki...
W-well, that's another loss for you, Chiaki...
Hm. Your stockings are next, I'm guessing?
D.Va, does the VA in your name stand for Virginia? Like Virginia Smash?
Oh! With all the bunny motifs, maybe you have some sort of jumping or reflex Quirk? Or hearing? Hmm…
Well, you’re very competitive, at least! I think that’s an American thing, anyway…
You’re so weird, D.Va.
Hm…
Felicia! Do you happen to know the Pussycats?
You just have a Cat Quirk, huh? It's um. Kind of like Tsu's.
Y-you seem nice, at least, Florina. Just stay calm--
Well, if you're sure, Futaba, hold on! There! You're up and away!
If you're sure. I know it doesn't look like I just gave her a pat, but feel free to act like I did, everyone, ~player~ probably won't notice.
A Spider-Woman?
So are you a hero or a vigilante? I have this weird itch at the back of my brain whenever I try to think about where I’ve heard about you…
I’m actually really impressed! Your Japanese is super good, Gwen!
Hmm…
I feel like from one hero to another, I should be doing more to help you out… B-but the context for this is so weird!
OH NO!
Oh! I think I’ve heard of Hogwarts.
Huh. How does that Quirk work, Hermione?
Whoa! Those wings are super cool! And I’m definitely not talking to just distract myself from the game.
Er. You don’t happen to know someone named Toga Himiko, do you, Marceline?
I kind of want to give you a touch to see how our Quirks would interact--
Do you actually drink blood, Marceline?
You are really chesty, though…
Hmm. So I’m guessing you have all that thick insulation because of some sort of temperature Quirk?
I promise I won’t give Mei the cold shoulder...
I’m so anxious for you, Meia!
You’re so composed about this, Meia!
Um. Meia?
E-er, w-wait a second, are you just going to take off--
G-g-gah! Just b-because you’re so comfortable--
Mercy! What a pretty name!
Huh!
You're Neopolitan, that famous criminal, aren't you?
(Saki's even more embarrassed than I am. I have to help her!)
I-I'm glad to see that Chiaki and I are both concerned for you, Saki.
(Saki again. She seems Quirkless. So of course I should help her out!)
D-don't worry, Saki. I believe in you!
Oh! Your hair’s… Really bright, Sei!
Hm… I’ve never heard of the White Knights. Is that a medic organization or…?
Should you maybe slow down on the liquor, Sei? It can’t be healthy for you to just keep going like that…
W-well, whoever you work with, Sei, you certainly seem well-equipped...
I really wish someone had caught that black-market equipment specialist.
Oh! Are you trying to cosplay my friend Froppy, Sonya?
W-wait, w-what are you doing?
Er, I’m obligated to ask, Streaming-chan, is that camera something you need to have on you?
S-seriously, Streaming-chan, I don’t know what you do professionally…
Wait, the Tracer?!
Time-related Quirks are super rare, but to think you can use yours to phase through stuff, or rewind time, or dash forward through space…
Huh! What’s your Quirk, Twilight Sparkle? Something to do with stars or shadows, I’m guessing, based on your name.
You know, I-I was thinking that last play was kind of smart, TS, now you d-don’t have to--
You’re an odd one, Twilight Sparkle.
I guess you play like Momo studied: You like to get the big tasks done first.
Hmm. It’s kind of strange having to react less surprised as you lose more items, Twilight Sparkle.
Oh! I think I get it now!
Not much now, Ms. “Alien” Twilight Sparkle!
Huh. You haven’t shown off your-- your n-n-nipples yet, t-t-though.
Huh! Is that a Quirk school uniform, Videl? Where did you learn to master your powers?
You look like you’re fresh from a workout!
I get it! Wii Fit Trainer… Well, that describes your profession! All of us, in good shape together!
Argh, sorry Wii Fit Trainer!
It’s k-kind of funny, I was actually talking a lot about your bra earlier, but I f-f-forgot to compliment your legs!
O-oh s-shoot. I-I-I- Um. I’m going to take a deep breath and try and focus. T-this suddenly got a lot more real.
Oh, already?!
That was fast!
I-I’ll just stare elsewhere. Oh gosh, my face is just getting so red, isn’t it?
I-I-I’m just going to look away now.
He-he-he’s going to take off his ~clothing~? T-that means…
I-I'm so sorry, ~name~!
H-h-h-he’s going to take off his ~clothing~? T-that means…
O-oh no no no. I-I shouldn’t-- It’s so rude to look--
Eerp.
O-oh. So your coat? It was kind of villainous, but it also looked kind of cool--
Oh no, ~name~, you have to take off something so big?
Your ~clothing~? Did you really need to take off something so big so soon?
Whoa, you have so much control! I have to brute force things a little bit, so it’s really impressive you have such good aim!
What ever happened to you after that… Shoot, I thought I was pretty good at history…
I-it's kind of rude to use your Quirk to send a projection when the rest of us are here in the flesh...
Those types of Quirks are really something, huh?
Um... You really aren't a villain, are you?
I still think you frame things to be too much like Shigaraki...
Careful, Futaba! Don't lose your stuff! Or your lunch!
Happy to help someone in need!
E-er, I didn’t know there was a rule that we could take off our costumes in two pieces…
You’re that Quirk school in England, right? Er... the one that had all the issues with villains?
Are you teleporting your clothes? I hope you aren’t disintegrating them!
I really hope you aren't disintegrating them... Aimee already seems hellbent on destroying her apparel.
You’ve mentioned that you like the color red a few times…
You’re like Todoroki, but with one half of his powers!
So what is your Quirk? I completely forgot to ask about that eye… patch… thingy you were wearing.
W-well, I hope you’re less dangerous without your gloves, Shego. I know Bakugo has a hard time focusing his blasts without his...
Um. I can respect someone trying to turn around when they're embarrassed... I don't know why I didn't think of that...
Oh! Well, aren't you... well, ~name~.
His… His… M-m-m-m--
His… His… M-m-m-m--
I'm sorry, ~name~! Let's do better next time!
Stay brave! I might not be able to keep you safe from embarrassment, but I'll try!
I-Er, I can't save you from bad cards, but I'll try to lose the next hand!
I kind of do it better when I’m either focused or stressed. Funny how that works, right?
Er… I don’t suppose you’re shy about it and it’s not something I’m supposed to talk about?
I’m so jealous of your Quirk, ~name~! It must be great to just… Lift off...
I-I kind of think about it every now and then
E-er… Sorry ~name~, I can stick around for the rest of the game but this is way harder for me than putting a stop to some villains.
Er… You’d be surprised at how often costumes seem to get torn in embarrassing ways. T-that’s why I always wear a bra! And underwear!
Not that I’d have had any reason to have done that before. You know what, nevermind.
Changing between missions in a co-ed environment where undressing is a penalty. Nope, not frightening at all.
Y-you still look good without your ~clothing~! Don’t give up yet, ~name~!
E-erm. I wonder if embarrassment is contagious…
I know you’re embarrassed, ~name~, but we can’t just be ashamed for no reason!
I’ve got your back, ~name~, as someone else who can be… Um. Fairly traditional about nudity.
Um. Sorry, I just get kind of… Hero-y.
T-that was a strange outburst from me! I’m s-sorry, ~name~! W-wait! Why should I be sorry! You’re a villain!
I sure hope not. Because that makes me k-kind of an idiot.
W-well! It sure didn’t work! I wanted to come to this of my own free will-- N-no wait, I didn’t mean!
I can’t believe you took off your ~clothing~, ~name~! I’m embarrassed just thinking about it!
Your ~clothing~? That's supposed to cover a lot, so now you’re showing a lot, and so now I’m embarrassed a lot!
Mmhmm! This isn’t making me super uncomfortable. Nope. I am A-OK!
Mmf. Yes. I am nodding my head. This is fine. I am not cringing internally.
Oh! You have a sharpshooting Quirk! Just… Please be careful!
M-maybe you want to gush in other ways, which is why you wore such a tight suit.
I think a villain would be a lot more sinister when she took off her mask… Though do you actually have some sort of vocal Quirk? I’ve never heard someone make a sound like that!
Just sewn back together to vaguely resemble webs… W-w-what? N-no! I was just looking at your equipment! I wasn’t--
Whoa! So that suit was part of your Quirk? That's so cool! But. Um. What else does it do?
C-couldn't you have g-gone with something less... exposing...? Unless that's your Quirk?
But do you have some sort of synergy power? And... e-err... you look really sweaty... like really sweaty.

I bet your services are really something else! Though maybe you shouldn’t book yourself so often you show up to a game like this still sweating… Or maybe you’ve learned how to make the best of a sweating Quirk, considering you looked so dry earlier…
Oh my! You're impressive! No wonder you wanted to take that out so soon!
His… His… M-m-m-m--
Oh no, ~name~! You're--You're already--!?
O-oh, she, she's going to... a-already? T-that's--
Oh, ~name~’s going to show us h-h-her...!
I’ll just go ahead and stare straight ahead.
But aren’t you kind of destroying your clothes? How are you going to get home?
I-I see you're g-going to do the same thing y-you did last round...
Somehow I don't think Mandalay and the other Pussycats have to go through this.
W-what does that have to do with anything?
Uh- um. Errr. W-whatever f-floats your webs, Gwen!
This again? C-could you maybe just... not?
H-hey! You shouldn’t just--
Um. I-I’m not sure I’ve ever actually heard of a hero with that name before. I-it's kinda weird!
Oh! I-I-I expected your bra to be next. I definitely appreciate something really support...y when I’m suited up.
Well, that's actually probably a bit warm...
Um. Sorry, ~name~! I don't really want to throw my hand, but if you start getting really vulnerable I'll...
T-that’s… C-c-certainly... to take your boots off and socks instead of spacing those out...
You remind me a lot about him, but he’s… Sometimes bigger in person. Also louder, but that only helps to inspire confidence in him!
Oh no. Some people are into that. I'M NOT AND IT'S COOL IF YOU ARE BUT--
Hmm. Is that something you brought because you're sentimental, or does it help you with your Quirk, ~name~?
Well, I suppose I'm still fully dressed... Which is good for me but not so great if ~name~ keeps losing!
And what’s with the blindfold? I thought for sure you’d take that off first!
Pfft. Aliens aren’t real. Just because some people look strange doesn’t make them extraterrestrial.
Aliens aren’t real. People like, say, Twilight, look unusual, but are just like you or me!
Th-though I don't think I'd want to play this game with him.
Er. If you could not pay it back tenfold and keep being nice, I know I'd be a lot happier.
I-I mean I'm sure glad your pants didn't fall down, at least!
E-er. W-well, at least we can pretend like nothing's happened or gone wrong, right?
You... Really, ~name~?
O-Oh. G-Gah, I'm sorry, Pit. Is this something new for you!?
Surely you lost on purpose?
I'm going to feel really bad if you're just enormously bad at cards.
Um. At least that looks fun?
T-that's a catchy song, Nagisa!
Ah! ~name~! Sorry! At least the boys seem to be enjoying undressing...
Sorry, ~name~, I'm still trying to figure out how to play or I'd give you some advice!
Stay confident, ~name~! I have a feeling if you just remain calm we can get us all through this!
O-oh s-shoot. I-I-I- Um. I’m going to take a deep breath and try and focus. T-this suddenly got a lot more real.
But I haven't lost anything yet... I'm kind of sad you're playing so badly.
There's nothing wrong with hair down there. But I think most people prefer some management.
Whether you're just happy with how you are naturally or didn't plan to be stripping today, ~name~, there's no need to worry. Some of us are in that same spot!
Oh! That looks very neat, ~name~.
Hm! I do that sometimes. And ah, since you're already naked, I guess I should do expectation management that today isn't one of those days.
Hm! Most heroes I know either go totally bare or just let it go wild. You must really care about your appearance, ~name~!
Wow, you put a lot of effort into that, ~name~! It seems a lot easier to take it all off or just leave it be. Your boyfriend must be very happy!
Her... her...! M-m-m-m--
S-shoot, are you okay?
This raises a lot of questions about some people I know with body quirks, and they're questions I'd really rather avoid.
I’m absolutely flesh and blood! …I-I’m not quite sure why I phrased it like that.
Please don't shapeshift anymore. It's really rude to her.
I'm glad you aren't mimicing her, but I also noticed your... Um. Hair is changing color. T-that's kinda weird.
--I’m so confused right now.
Unless that’s your actual name, which might explain why you’re acting a bit strange… G-gah! Watch what you're taking off! We can all see y-your...
Though something cute and frilly adds a lot to a wardrobe! N-not unlike your... your... erk.
I've known women with high sex drives but this is kinda gross, ~name~.
She’s seriously going to.
W-whoa. Okay, that I didn't expect. You were here the whole time! You just have a body solidifying Quirk like Lemillion!
Can you make clones of yourself, Elizabeth? Or is this something else?! It seems really strong, and you have to have a… Lot of control to… Use it like this…
T-that’s! I-!
N-not that I always do... OR DO IN GENERAL!
W-w-what a weird Quirk!
Oh no! Your ~clothing~'s such a substantial piece!
Yikes, ~name~. I can protect you from villains but even I can't save you from yourself.
S-so, ~name~, you can float too, right?
Hm… How high can you go, ~name~? I-I mean, if you fly or hover?
Zero Gravity doesn’t actually let me fly…
I-I think if I were a bit more… Um. You know... I could use my Quirk to gracefully slip out of my clothes…
S-shoot. Don’t worry, ~name~! I know when to step in as part of a hero team! I’ve got the next one! I-I think.
O-oh no, ~name~! Don’t let your costume get too battle-damaged!
~name~ is up? Just… Act like we’re changing between missions!
~name~ l-l-lost? Argh, I’d offer to assist but that’s less… Mission-oriented…
Phew. I can see I’m not the only one here who’s not thrilled by the prospect of this game…
Don’t worry, ~name~, I know I seem pretty brave, but I’m also really freaked out right now.
H-heh. I’m kind of… Jeez, do I really sound like that when…?
E-eh. Heh-heh… D-don’t worry ~name~, look how well I’m holding up, and I-I-
Serves you right, ~name~!
Take that, ~name~!
~name~, did you help set this up? Were you the bait to lure heroes into some sort of trap?
I-I can’t tell if I’m supposed to stop you from losing, or if making you lose will make your trap backfire! ~name~, your villainy stops here! Or something cool like that!
I-I’ll just stare elsewhere. Oh gosh, my face is just getting so red, isn’t it?
I-I-I’m just going to look away now.
A-a-ah, do you have to?
I-is he going to--? His ~clothing~?
D-does he really need to…?
A-are you sure, ~name~?
Hmmf!
Hrm. Mmf? Mmhmm.
A hero's supposed to protect people... I hope this'll be okay.
Well, I hope we can all stay cheery!
Hm. This is such an odd game.
I-I hope you are just as unshy as he is. F-for your sake.
On the plus side, you’re not quite as… Unusual as some of the support-class at UA! I bet you lead a fun life, at least!
Tomura Shigaraki! He's real bad news and talks about video games as much as you do! I'm keeping an eye on you, Chiaki...
H-hey, Chiaki, I think Saki wants to ask you something...
I'm n-not going to let my guard down!
Y-you can't get me to let my guard down!
You’re clearly also ready for combat, but I can’t get a good feel for your Quirk…
Or maybe it’s an American thing I don’t quite get. I’ll admit most of what I know about the US comes from All Might or Deku…
What? Are you even paying attention, D.Va?
Either way, it’s a very interesting style. If you want lots of pieces to win the game...
Hm... You're braver than you act, huh, Florina?
Er-- A hero should know when to go for backup, but I guess there's no running here...
Gah! I sure hope not!

I’m totally paying attention to your rebuttal. Yep. Sure am! Definitely not using this to focus on the fact that I think you can fly to distance myself from how much better at… Being composed you are.
Though how are you floating? I know there’s some complicated Quirks out there, but “Vampire” and all its powers seems very strong...
N-not like, in a way that’s relevant to this game!
I wouldn’t want to-- Especially not with another woman-- I just-- Hmrmhph!
It’ll… take too long explain so I’m just going to pretend like it didn’t happen…
Hm… I’m keeping an eye on you…
Your costume certainly looks like it’s built for impacts or acceleration. And you’re so serious! I-I could probably stand to gain some composure from you.
I mean, obviously something medical related… It’s kind of hard to just be a doctor without something extra these days…
T-though you don't have to act the part, I hope you know...
I'll take you down, and bring you to justice, Neopolitan!
D-don't worry! I believe in you! Stay Plus Ultra, Saki! (Phew.)
We-well. L-looks like we're in this together, Saki and Chiaki.
I mean, some of us dress in some really silly costumes, Saki. I wouldn't worry about your shoes!
Comfort should come before style, I think! I mean, I dress in a ridiculous costume like this!
Huh? Not a hero? You just carry around all that stuff for work?
Well, I think you’re starting to get less outfitted. But it’s what you do that makes you a hero, I think.
Ha! So you are a he--r--ohhh. Hrmph. T-that seems like a bad superpower!
W-well, I'll tell her about this. N-not about the game, but I'm sure she'd be really flattered!
T-that could be pretty damaging to some people’s careers, I think. Y-you know?
P-please?
I haven’t been out of the academy for very long, but I thought your “Chronal Acceleration” Quirk was awesome!
U-um. Anyway, I have a friend whose Quirk was similar to yours, in how he could phase through solid objects. Could I get an autograph for him? I-if it’s no trouble.
Hmm… I wonder if Tohru would employ the same strategy… Though it’s not like anyone can see her when she’s n-n-naked.
But I have a feeling you’ve probably inspired a lot of interesting sets of tactics in a game like this…
And this is how you… Process that, I suppose I’ll just relax and try to keep an eye on everyone else.
I wish we'd met in less embarrassing circumstances...
I hope that you're um... doing okay, ~name~. I know I'd be kinda mad if I lost something big like that and someone else hadn't lost anything.
Well, I think the crowd appreciates it, at least!
I-Er, I can't save you from bad cards, but I'll try to lose the next hand!
I kind of do it better when I’m either focused or stressed. Funny how that works, right?
Er… I don’t suppose you’re shy about it and it’s not something I’m supposed to talk about?
I’m so jealous of your Quirk, ~name~! It must be great to just… Lift off...
I-I kind of think about it every now and then
E-er… Sorry ~name~, I can stick around for the rest of the game but this is way harder for me than putting a stop to some villains.
Er… You’d be surprised at how often costumes seem to get torn in embarrassing ways. T-that’s why I always wear a bra! And underwear!
Not that I’d have had any reason to have done that before. You know what, nevermind.
Changing between missions in a co-ed environment where undressing is a penalty. Nope, not frightening at all.
Y-you still look good without your ~clothing~! Don’t give up yet, ~name~!
E-erm. I wonder if embarrassment is contagious…
I know you’re embarrassed, ~name~, but we can’t just be ashamed for no reason!
I’ve got your back, ~name~, as someone else who can be… Um. Fairly traditional about nudity.
Um. Sorry, I just get kind of… Hero-y.
T-that was a strange outburst from me! I’m s-sorry, ~name~! W-wait! Why should I be sorry! You’re a villain!
I sure hope not. Because that makes me k-kind of an idiot.
W-well! It sure didn’t work! I wanted to come to this of my own free will-- N-no wait, I didn’t mean!
I can’t believe you took off your ~clothing~, ~name~! I’m embarrassed just thinking about it!
Um. S-sorry, I just got distracted. By a villain. And not your ~clothing~ being on the floor.
Your ~clothing~?! That's supposed to cover a lot, so now you’re showing a lot, and so now I’m embarrassed a lot!
~Clothing~ is supposed to cover a lot, so now you’re showing a lot, and so now I’m embarrassed a lot!
Mmhmm! This isn’t making me super uncomfortable. Nope. I am A-OK!
Mmf. Yes. I am nodding my head. This is fine. I am not cringing internally.
I give up. You’re clearly playing this game a little differently than the rest, but you don’t seem too bothered by getting naked… S-so, Well, best of luck, 9S! Keep at it!
Are you some kind of pervert, or just an idiot?
I suppose boys do have less of a hangup in taking off their shirts...
Um. ~name~, are you okay like that? You're a bit distracting...
E-erk. T-that sure is a chest!
U-uhm. W-well. T-there's ~name~'s chest.
I-I'm kind of shocked you're showing off your chest when that's the biggest thing people have taken off so far!
T-there it is, I guess.
W-what? I-I-I-- Y-y-you have no-- Er!
Hm. I can’t say I’ve seen that kind of physical difference before. I don’t think it’s that unusual though, is it?
Oh! We match! It must be hard without a gravity Quirk, though...
E-erk. T-that sure is a chest!
U-uhm. W-well. T-there's ~name~'s chest.
E-erk. T-that sure is a chest!
Th-that has to be a first. What an i-interesting Quirk you have, Felicia.
Don’t freeze up, Mei!
Oh! Be careful, ~name~! I can protect you from a lot, but I can't protect you from your cards!
Hmm... Huh? Oh! Sorry, I can't stop you from losing, ~name~, but I'm trying to figure out a way for us to de-escalate this... game.
ost of the stuff I know about America I know from comic books. And All Might’s special moves.
Gunhead trained me in mixed martial arts! I’m actually really threatening in close combat. Hi-ya! Wh-whoa!
You know, I always did want to be a sorcerer growing up… Is that weird?
Oh no! Even when I'm trying to lose... argh! Sorry, ~name~!
You’re kind of dressed like a villain, 9S.
Hmm… I guess you have some sort of special skill with machines, based on your Pod and how much you like to talk about numbers.
You’re really attached to that visor of yours, 9S. I bet it’s really important to your Quirk!
I guess you’re not counting that support “Pod” of yours as an item… So maybe it’s a focus for…
Ohh…
You know, Captain America, you remind me a lot of a dear friend...
You look like an outlaw, Mr. McCree... Though you also look kind of like Snipe...
So, what's your Quirk like, Pit?
You have wings are are going for a really angelic kind of appearance, right? I'm guessing you have some sort of flight Quirk.
W-well, better you than me, Pit!
O-oh no. I re-re-really hope it's nothing big this time!
O-oh s-shoot. I-I-I- Um. I’m going to take a deep breath and try and focus. T-this suddenly got a lot more real.
Are... are you serious?
A female character has just removed that small item.
Are you seriously going to--
W-w-wait! I-I'm so confused. Y-you're a projection, r-right? H-how?
You have a Quirk!? Wait, what?!
Y-you aren't going to... Er, start licking yourself, are you!?
E-er, sorry Kyu. I didn’t mean to kind of just… Ignore you. But you’re a lot more forward about s-s-se-- stuff. S-so, um. Er. Have f-fun?
Oh so you also stay floating when you--
You’re keeping your glasses, even though you’re about to…?
To-to-to be absolutely c-clear, this isn't what I wanted when I suggested conditioning.
Oh! Be careful, ~name~! I can protect you from a lot, but I can't protect you from your cards!
Hmm... Huh? Oh! Sorry, I can't stop you from losing, ~name~, but I'm trying to figure out a way for us to de-escalate this... game.
O-oh s-shoot. I-I-I- Um. I’m going to take a deep breath and try and focus. T-this suddenly got a lot more real.
I think you and my old friend Mineta would have something in common...
His… His… M-m-m-m--
His… His… M-m-m-m--
Your ~clothing~?
~name~'s taking off his ~clothing~?
Though I never expected to learn something like this!

I mean, not naked-- Just… Because I’m kind of already-- Mmfhg!
You really shouldn't, Neo. At least you had the decency to change back instead of mocking the other players.
I-I always think it's... interesting to see how... skin color affects... Everything. Heh heh. This isn't awkward at all!
I’m kind of curious if there’s Quirks out there that make people act s-so strangely… But like, only the user.
Normally I do most of my training per Hero standards, but I think a little bit of extra conditioning would be great! Could I call you to schedule a few courses after this?
Am I allowed to hold ~name~'s ~clothing~ now that I've lost?
Oh, I hadn't noticed your ~clothing~, ~name~! Could I see it?
Though I never expected to learn something like this!
Oh, so you have a vocal quirk like Present Mic? He's such a funny teacher.
While anyone can certainly be a hero, I think based on how you’re dressed it’s probably not a strict regimen.
You aren't associated with that hand-guy, are you, Chiaki!?
I'm kind of nervous to find out what your Quirk could be...
Are you American? You certainly seem quite sure of yourself…
Oh, duh, it has to be something sound related. D.Va, like diva! I get it. Kind on the nose, though…
You… Surely needed those for something interesting, right? Just for listening to music?
Do you have a Quirk that makes you need an outfit like that? Or do you just like to dress all historical?
What kind of Quirk do you use with a belt like that, Florina? Oh! You seem so jittery! M-maybe it's for like... o-or maybe you're just embarrassed...
--W-WAIT! We can leave!? I-I'm gonna go too!
Well, you only have two arms and two legs, so I’m guessing you have a web-based Quirk? Or…
What kind of stuff does the “Fairy” Quirk let you do? Flight, right? Good! I’m going to go ahead and try avoid being embarrassed. I’d turn pinker than you!
She’s one of the few people I know with teeth like that…
Um! S-sorry, that’s a really embarrassing reaction.
Do you happen to have an affinity for technology, other Mei?
You remind me a lot of Ingenium!
You look so… healthy. And you’re a doctor? What’s your Quirk like?
It’s… Kinda rare to see a “demon”-type Quirk…
I know you're the quiet type. But that doesn't mean I don't know a villain when I see one.
Y-you look even better without your tie, Saki!
I-I'm not really happy with this type of thing either, you two.
Those are nice shoes, Saki! I think I have a pair just like them!
H-hey! D-don't look up her skirt, everyone!
You’re really loaded out with lots of gear. I can see you’re a utility-type Hero!
I’ve never heard of Glitch City either… But White Knights and Valkyries sounds awfully like a Pro Hero group of some sort…
…Unless you had some sort of digestion Quirk? I used to know someone who gained a lot of strength whenever he’d eat sugar…
I'm always really flattered and amazed by how popular Pro Hero color palettes enter the mainstream wardrobe.
I don’t mind being recorded in my day to day work… B-b-ut I’m pretty uncomfortable with the idea that this’ll end up on the internet somewhere.
But can you leave the rest of us out of it?
I’m… Actually kind of a fan. I did a report on you back in school!
I really like my Quirk and it’s super useful for hero stuff and for more conventional trades, but I think everyone wishes they had a little more time.
It’s kind of weird, b-b-but you seem really comfortable while naked, so I g-g-guess that’s a nice way to be!
You must have practiced this game a lot if you’re bored enough to try something like this. Or crazy...
I-I’m sorry I didn’t realize it sooner, but this is kind of a fetish thing for you, isn’t it? I-- don’t really have any hangups like that, but if you're pretending that being an alien...
Well, you seem like you've got a legacy angle, and you like to fight in tournaments... I bet you'd have done will at UA!
Keep it up, ~name~! You're doing really well so far!
Your ~clothing~ looks super hot, ~name~! I mean, I bet the guys... or other girls... Really like it!
S-so, ~name~, you can float too, right?
Hm… How high can you go, ~name~? I-I mean, if you fly or hover?
Zero Gravity doesn’t actually let me fly…
I-I think if I were a bit more… Um. You know... I could use my Quirk to gracefully slip out of my clothes…
O-oh.
Gah, this feels so weird, watching you take off your ~clothing~ and er…
Ack, your ~clothing~?
W-well. It c-c-could be more awkward, couldn’t it?
S-shoot. Don’t worry, ~name~! I know when to step in as part of a hero team! I’ve got the next one! I-I think.
O-oh no, ~name~! Don’t let your costume get too battle-damaged!
~name~ is up? Just… Act like we’re changing between missions!
~name~ l-l-lost? Argh, I’d offer to assist but that’s less… Mission-oriented…
A-are you serious? We’re heroes, ~name~! We need to be better than this!
I’m just going to look away. That’s pretty much all I can do, right?
Y-yikes. At least it’s not something… More revealing. T-though I’m not sure what else could be…
Your ~clothing~? D-did you have nothing smaller? Like a gadget or a Quirk enhancer?
Phew. I can see I’m not the only one here who’s not thrilled by the prospect of this game…
Don’t worry, ~name~, I know I seem pretty brave, but I’m also really freaked out right now.
H-heh. I’m kind of… Jeez, do I really sound like that when…?
E-eh. Heh-heh… D-don’t worry ~name~, look how well I’m holding up, and I-I-
YEP, WE’RE FINE. ~name~. WE’RE FINE.
HA. HA. YEP. YEP YEP YEP. THIS SURE ISN’T EMOTIONALLY TAXING ON PEOPLE LIKE US.
I-I was doing pretty okay until ~name~ needed to take off her ~clothing~... Really! I was!
S-she’s just as embarrassed as I am…
Serves you right, ~name~!
Take that, ~name~!
~name~, did you help set this up? Were you the bait to lure heroes into some sort of trap?
I-I can’t tell if I’m supposed to stop you from losing, or if making you lose will make your trap backfire! ~name~, your villainy stops here! Or something cool like that!
I’m pretty sure I can legally just Zero Gravity you to the ceiling…
I should just use my Quirk to remove you from the game.
I-I feel like I’m way more embarrassed about this than ~name~.
Do… Do you just not feel ashamed for this, ~name~?
I-I’ll just stare elsewhere. Oh gosh, my face is just getting so red, isn’t it?
I-I-I’m just going to look away now.
A-a-ah, do you have to?
D-does she really need to…?
Hmmf!
Hrm. Mmf? Mmhmm.
I-I-I-
I feel like I’m really up and down about this kind of thing.
D-d-do y-you have something else you could... Take off... ~name~?
O-oh. ~name~ is taking off her... That's fine. Totally fine. Yep. Sexy even.
It’s fine. ~name~ is just taking off her clothing that’ll show off large portions of her skin.
E-erk.
Oh no! Everyone watch out, I’ll try to--
Most people I know would be gushing about their Quirk by now!
Hm. I guess you’re a hero then!

I was just looking at your costume. It’s actually not super complicated at all, is it? It’s just flexible material with a bit of rip-stoppage. It even looks kinda dirty and worn-out… And some of the patterning is definitely...
O-oh no! You weren't wearing anything under that, were you, Marinette!?
Y-you’re so comfortable with this! B-but there’s so many people and it’s not like we’re changing into something else--!
O-oh! We call it training gear too. Back when I was in school, we did have a full gym outfit, at least.
I don’t really know many people in that good of shape that aren’t Pro Heroes.
“Wii Fit!” You do have some sort of training boosting power. And you’re so gentle about how you speak.
Sigh, okay, it's still pretty nice to watch you take off your ~clothing~.
~name~, you did awesome this game!
Or are you just kind of smart and like to make support gadgets?
Do you know All Might, Captain America?
Y-you have kind of a strange relationship with your armorer, don't you, Pit? A-at least it's just your feet...
Welcome to the loser's bench, ~name~. It's got good company, at least!
Aimee! Oh no! Mercy, can you patch her up!?
Sei, do you have anything left you can use to patch her up!?
Aimee! Oh no! Can we get a medic over here?
I guess you're just a really good singer... and your Quirk is something entirely different. Or maybe not. Deku might be able to explain it...
Err-- Um… Uh…
Aw, we're neck and neck, aren't we, ~name~?
Don't worry ~name~, I don't think they're going to pay as much attention to you now that I've finished undressing!
What the character says before a female loses an item with the "major" type.
Err… Weird question, ~name~...
So you know how when you jump, you get that really light feeling in your feet, ~name~?
I don’t really know how to say this but be…
Um. At least you don’t… Have quite the chest I do… While floating… Um…
C-careful ~name~! If you move wrong, you can… Er. Kind of jiggle unflatteringly.
J-just pay attention to how you’re moving. I-if you don’t you might. Um. Jiggle. Lots.
W-well, I guess we can kind of...
Well, I hope that we can rise above this sort of thing. And...
Uh-- Uh-- Um. They don't really cover this type of challenge at UA...
Okay, s-so you’ve been saving some kind of Quirk to use that'll cover you up, right?
W-wha!? ~name~, s-surely you can’t show that? I-it’s not like you have a skin-related Quirk. Um. Do you?
Y-your... I-I-... T-this is some way to start a team-up...
I guess it’s not so bad if it’s... N-not because I’m interested, just because ~name~ has to be used to this--
I-I will say that at least you seemed equipped for the game…
I-I mean, we’re really getting down to it, aren’t we, ~name~? I completely forgot to ask if your agency assigned this to you… Or if you want to be here…
S-so, I’ve been meaning to ask, ~name~. Do you… Usually get sent by your agency to this type of mission? O-or w-would you do this sort of thing just for fun?
C-could ~name~ have something else for a penalty? A-asking for a friend.
Oh-- He has to-- W-wait, surely there’s something else--
Hnnnggggg...
Urgh...
Okay. If ~name~’s going to take off his ~clothing~ and show his chest, then the least I can do is be supportive for the rest of the game!
D-don’t give up ~name~!
G-gah, do you have nothing smaller left, ~name~!?
Y-you already have to...
You know, ~name~, if you just gave up, I’m s-sure we wouldn’t have to add embarrassing a hero to your list of crimes.
F-fine, ~name~. Just take off your ~clothing~. Show your chest. Don’t give up… Shoot, I thought reverse psychology would… Work… STOP YOUR CRIMES, VILLAIN!
Gah! W-why don’t you just surrender, ~name~!
You really could've avoided this whole situation, ~name~!
I-I’ll just stare elsewhere. Oh gosh, my face is just getting so red, isn’t it?
I-I-I’m just going to look away now.
S-sh-she’s going to take off her ~clothing~? T-that means…
O-oh no no no. I-I shouldn’t-- It’s so rude to look--
I-I promise I won't look, ~name~!
Re-really? Your chest, ~name~?
O-oh gosh. This is so stressful.
Um… Do you really have to…?
Y-yikes, ~name~ I'm s-sorry!
Eh!?
D-does she... Um, you know?
Though I’ve usually only heard of them being used to… Um. Take care of yourself, not get undressed.
H-hey, w-wait, a-are you naked already?!
As long as she chills out.
--Um… Maybe I should be trying to be a bit more like that… Y-you know, c-confident!
Gross. I hate shapeshifting Quirks.
--Take off anything that’s a big deal.
Those do look comfortable.
Something I’ve been really happy about is how comfortable most hero costume gear is. I honestly feel more at ease with all my upgrades most of the time. I guess we're different that way.
W-well, there they are!
You really have worked hard to get in such great shape!
I'm already getting wet again... Whatever Quirk ~name~ has, I'd love to study it...
Mmf. Does anyone else think ~name~ looks great?
I should take notes on this... For later.

Um. I just kind of realized, with the way the game's played, don't all of us but one person actually lose? Oh no, did I just do all this for... W-well! I'll just try and use this as a learning experience!
I'm just happy to have helped you for a little while!
Now if only you could use it for good…
The Battle of Florem Gardens? I thought you were arrested. Are you out on good behavior?
Now I feel really foolish. My mood's just been crushed.
E-er. I'm not a mind-reader or anything. Say, you're awfully quiet, huh?
W-well, I definintely won't step on it. L-look! I'll even try to float away from it!
Okay. If you want to be Saki's friend, you're probably not a bad person. Helping the vulnerable is always kind. I'm sorry, Chiaki.
A-anyway, t-this type of game isn't really something I'm good at either.
Well, at least someone had a good time. I'm happy it was Futaba, at least!
H-huh? S-sorry, I’m a little distracted by trying to not get flustered, Gwen! I could've taken my suit off in two steps!
We do get a few trainees from abroad, but it’s great to see that Europe also takes hero training seriously!
You seem really… Plain for something that seems so powerful. Or did you just show up in your street clothes or normal school uniform?
I’m super against blood-related stuff. It seems real gross!
Oh, and you use some sort of nozzle to channel it, right? Or is it just chemistry?
Y-you know. Your Quirk? That something special everyone's born with? Like my Zero Gravity? Kinda like this?
T-that sounds really, really cool, to be honest. I could use something like that for my withering pride, though.
W-why would I ever want to try on someone else's gear!? T-that's ludicrous!
I-I mean that's the basics of good suit design, right?
Er... It seems decidedly not.
Pffffft. Oh my gosh! Sonya! You're amazing at relieving tension! Using camouflage paint without a stealth Quirk. You are too funny!
Sonya! This is too funny! You're helping me feel a lot better! Way to keep your cool!
At least we'll be matching, ~name~!
I promise as a hero not to...
I'm getting a little lightheaded... Could you show us something to bring me back to Earth?
I wonder if it's like how I was thinking it was...
As long as you don’t… Um. You know.
H-Hm. ~name~, you know… Er…
I-if you just float like that anyone can see--see--see!
A-ah! D-don’t just flail your--
Um.
S-so, I-I’ve never really met someone else with a floating Quirk that I wasn’t… Er… Putting in jail. T-then if I asked them this question it w-would be… Er… Um.
W-wha!? ~name~, s-surely you can’t show that? I-it’s not like you have a skin-related Quirk. Um. Do you?
Y-your... I-I-... T-this is some way to start a team-up...
Ah! W-what about your hero ranking, ~name~?
Do you do anything weird down there…?
T-this reminds of a story, ~name~. I-I’m sure you’ve heard it too.
Y-you know, there’s actually a lot of stories… And fan… Art… About similar stories to this one, ~name~... about um. Heroes. Like us.
Um. I kind of fidget and use my Quirk on really small stuff when I’m trying to focus.
E-er! L-look at me and not ~name~! I’m f-floating! Isn’t that weird?
Errrrrrr---
Umm---
We’ve gotten this far, ~name~. I know this isn’t how either of us wanted to spend the night and you have to… Um. Anyway…
I just thought of something…
Er, I don’t want you to escape justice, but maybe you should just surrender yourself rather than…
~name~, you should surrender and turn yourself over! In! E-er. J-JUST GIVE UP!
S-such a shameful display. W-worthy only of a villain.
~name~, y-you really sh-shouldn’t have tried to fool me into this game!
I-I can still just take you to jail, ~name~. It would just give us both an excuse to leave…
C-could you surrender, ~name~, and give us both an excuse to leave?
Oh, ~name~’s going to show us his… His… His…
G-guh, I-I don't know where to look!
I’ll just go ahead and stare straight ahead.
R-really? D-do you want to take something else off, ~name~?
U-umh. H-hold on dealer, I-isn't there something else he can do so he doesn't... so we don't have to... um.
E-err… Hmm!
This was fun!
I'm sorry if I didn't manage to keep anyone safe, but I hope my... Heroic display was worth it!
Hmm.... Sorry, was just spacing out.
So um. How'd I do?
M-my...? O-oh, right. I'm fine! Thanks for asking, Pit!
Ow! My poor butt... okay. Sometimes I lose control a little bit...
It's getting kind of cold here...
I wish you'd all finish up already, I want to get dressed...
I'm still shaking from that.
Oh. Oh no. I usually don't get sick when I... Phew. It just passed!
Phew. This was fun. I'd probably recommend this to some of my other friends!

text.content: Oh, hi!
~name~, right?
Let me think, we met at...
...Oh, yeah.
...You don't have to say it.
I remember it perfectly.
(Whether I try to or not...)
Yeah, it was kind of really awkward.
...But at the same time...
...Sort of really fun?
And now that you're here.
With me, and all.
And I should be taking a break from my patrol soon anyway...
We could always...
...Y'know.
...Duck into that alleyway for a sec?
Maybe?
Please?
Oh, this is great!
Perfect, even.
I don't think anyone's going to bother us here...
Far away from any possible interruptions...
Sorry, but, would you mind maybe... Looking away for a second while I unzip my costume?
I know it's silly of me, all things considered. It's just...
You know how it is when you're so used to doing things one way that it becomes hard to break, regardless of any and all logic?
Plus, you've already seen me... strip... anyway, so, it's not like you're missing out.
I know it's not the best place to set the mood, either.
An alleyway like this is...
...Sort of creepy, right?
It's like the sort of place that that Hero Killer guy would lure his victims, right?
Man, that Stain guy was so...
...totally...
Right?
No, no, shhh, don't scream!
I only need a teensy-weensy little bit of your blood, 'kay?
It won't hurt that much, it's just like at the doctor's.
Except, here, the needle is just a little bit bigger!
But don't worry! It'll all be over soon.
There we go. That wasn't so bad, was it?
See, that's your blood right there. Suck, suck, suck~! ❤
And you're helping me out so much by doing this!
See, us villains, if we wanna play at the Inventory, we have to fill out aaaaaaallllll this paperwork.
Just piles and piles of forms and -blech- who has time for that?
So I figured that I could get around all that if I just made myself look like one of the usual clientele!
Doesn't it feel nice to help a friend like this?
I mean, we are friends now, right?
(You saw me naked, after all...)
Oh! All done! ❤
You might be a little tired after that, so get some rest, 'kay?
You're going to need it for what's coming.
Hope I see you again, new friend!
~name~? Are you awake..?
H-hey there…
I'm so glad you're okay. Everyone's been so worried about you…!
I'm so ashamed about all of this. If I hadn't let her take my blood all those years ago…
You wouldn't have had to volunteer for that… or um… you know… gotten so distracted by her...
They're putting me on leave for a bit while they figure out what to do. So I um. Wanted to come make sure you were okay.
Is there… Anything I can do to make it up to you?
You acted so bravely and… so heroic. I need to pay you back somehow!
W-what? I-it's not like I have a Quirk that'll let me kiss it better, ~name~!
T-though…
If it would help you feel better…
Okay. I'll… just… lean in… and...
Mmm. Mmm…
W-wow. You're…
Good… at this…
I… Whew. Sorry, let me catch my breath. I think I'll need it… in a minute…
The doctors say your Quirk… works best when you… you know. Finish, ~name~.
That's why we needed you for the Inventory mission and… well, it’s late… everyone else in the ward is asleep or gone…
W-well. You were so brave for me… I should be brave for you. And… I'd give you. M-more but… you know. You're injured.
Let me do this for you, ~name~.
Let me help you find a release of your own. Okay?
